hints.content: He is a wooden puppet.
His nose grows when he lies.
He wants to be a real boy.
His father is Geppetto.
His conscience is Jiminy Cricket.
He gets turned into a donkey (partially).
He is swallowed by a whale.
He sings 'I've Got No Strings'.
He is brought to life by the Blue Fairy.
He smokes a cigar on Pleasure Island.
He is voiced by Dickie Jones.
He wears a yellow hat with a blue band and red feather.
He is tricked by Honest John and Gideon.
He performs in Stromboli's puppet show.
He saves his father from drowning.
He has a feather in his hat.
He is very naive.
He burns his finger.
He kicks Gideon in the rear.
He becomes a real boy at the end.
He is Mickey's dog.
He is a bloodhound (mixed).
He is yellow/orange in color.
He doesn't speak (usually).
He has a green collar.
He is one of the Sensational Six.
He fights with Chip 'n Dale.
He has a nemesis named Butch.
He was originally named Rover.
He has a good angel and bad angel on his shoulder.
He loves sausages.
He gets stuck to flypaper.
He has a son named Pluto Junior.
He is very loyal to Mickey.
He sniffs out trouble.
He has black ears.
He saves Mickey from a train.
He is named after a planet (now dwarf planet).
He chases cats.
He howls when he's sad.
She is the daughter of Chief Powhatan.
She paints with all the colors of the wind.
She falls in love with John Smith.
She has a raccoon friend named Meeko.
She has a hummingbird friend named Flit.
She seeks advice from Grandmother Willow.
She saves John Smith's life.
She wears a necklace from her mother.
She sings 'Just Around the Riverbend'.
She is voiced by Irene Bedard (speaking) and Judy Kuhn (singing).
She stops a war.
She chooses to stay with her people.
She has a tattoo on her arm.
She runs through the forest.
She dives off a high cliff.
She is the seventh Disney Princess.
She is based on a real historical figure.
She has long black hair.
She learns to listen with her heart.
She travels to England in the sequel.
He wakes Snow White with a kiss.
He sings 'One Song'.
He rides a white horse.
He hears Snow White singing at the wishing well.
He wears a blue tunic and red cape.
He is the first Disney Prince.
He searches for Snow White.
He takes Snow White to his castle in the clouds.
He is often just called 'The Prince'.
He is voiced by Harry Stockwell.
He bows to Snow White.
He is very romantic.
He has brown hair.
He appears briefly at the beginning and end.
He is charmed by Snow White's voice.
He scares Snow White initially.
He wears a hat with a feather.
He is a generic prince character.
He serenades Snow White.
He is the love interest.
He searches for the girl who fits the glass slipper.
He dances with Cinderella at the ball.
He is the son of the King.
He yawns at the other maidens.
He wears a cream-colored jacket with gold epaulettes.
He falls in love at first sight.
He is determined to find his love.
He is voiced by William Phipps (speaking) and Mike Douglas (singing).
He has a father who really wants grandchildren.
He is chased by the Grand Duke.
He jumps out a window in the third movie.
He is a skilled swordsman.
He has black hair.
He marries Cinderella.
He is often confused with Snow White's prince.
He sings 'So This is Love'.
He doesn't know Cinderella's name.
He is polite and gallant.
He fights to get to the ball in the third movie.
He is the object of the stepsisters' affection.
He is a sailor prince.
He plays the flute.
He has a dog named Max.
He is saved from drowning by Ariel.
He is hypnotized by Ursula.
He kills Ursula with a ship.
He has black hair and blue eyes.
He lives in a castle by the sea.
He is voiced by Christopher Daniel Barnes.
He almost marries Vanessa.
He takes Ariel on a tour of his kingdom.
He rows a boat in a lagoon.
He is the only Disney Prince to not sing in his original movie.
He is looking for the girl with the beautiful voice.
He wears a white shirt and blue pants.
He is brave and adventurous.
He has a statue of himself.
He marries Ariel.
He becomes a father to Melody.
He fights sharks.
He is a pot-bellied pig.
He is Moana's pet.
He acts like a puppy.
He stays on the island during the journey.
He is white with grey spots.
He is afraid of the water.
He squeals.
He is very loyal.
He is almost eaten by villagers.
He runs to Moana when she returns.
He is voiced by Pua (pig sounds).
He has floppy ears.
He is cute and cuddly.
He was originally going to go on the adventure.
He is Moana's best friend on the island.
He follows Moana everywhere.
He is a sidekick.
He has a pink nose.
He is relieved when Moana comes home.
He is a pig.
He is a warthog.
He is Timon's best friend.
He eats bugs.
He has a gas problem.
He sings 'Hakuna Matata'.
He saves Simba.
He is voiced by Ernie Sabella.
He calls himself 'MISTER Pig'.
He fights hyenas.
He is the first Disney character to fart on screen.
He is very sensitive.
He thinks stars are balls of gas burning billions of miles away.
He acts as live bait.
He has tusks.
He is reddish-brown.
He is loyal and brave.
He bows to Simba.
He raises a lion cub.
He loves 'grub'.
He says 'She's gonna eat me!'.
She shouts 'Off with their heads!'.
She rules Wonderland.
She plays croquet with flamingos.
She hates white roses.
She has a tiny husband named the King of Hearts.
She wears a red and black dress.
She has a bad temper.
She puts Alice on trial.
She is voiced by Verna Felton.
She wears heart-patterned underwear.
She gets knocked over by Alice.
She is a tyrant.
She demands to win every game.
She is large and imposing.
She threatens the Cheshire Cat.
She is one of the primary villains.
She has card soldiers.
She turns purple with rage.
She orders the execution of the cards.
She asks 'Who's been painting my roses red?'.
She has very long magical hair.
She lives in a tower.
She wants to see the floating lanterns.
She has a pet chameleon named Pascal.
She uses a frying pan as a weapon.
She heals people with her hair.
She is the lost princess.
She falls in love with Flynn Rider.
She is kidnapped by Mother Gothel.
She sings 'When Will My Life Begin'.
She paints murals on her walls.
She is voiced by Mandy Moore.
Her hair turns brown when cut.
She walks barefoot.
She charms the pub thugs.
She is the tenth Disney Princess.
She has green eyes.
She saves Flynn with her tears.
She is 18 years old.
She wears a purple dress.
